content:
Based on the execution logs and entity data, here's the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-15, -50)
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) connected to wooden chest (position -14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace (position -14.0, -47.0) processing iron ore to plates

### Iron Smelting Array (0, 0) to (6, 4)
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0) for copper processing
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0) processing iron ore
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0) processing iron ore

### Automation Science Pack Factory (21-28, 4)
- Input wooden chest at (21.5, 4.5)
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 4.5) feeding from input chest
- Assembling machine 1 at (24.5, 4.5) crafting automation science packs
- Burner inserter at (26.5, 4.5) outputting to storage
- Output wooden chest at (27.5, 4.5) storing finished science packs
- Connected by electric poles at (22.5, 6.5), (24.5, 6.5), and (24.5, 2.5)

### Power Generation System (-9, 24) to (9, 19)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-2.0, 23.5)
- Steam engine at (9.5, 19.5)
- Connected by pipe networks:
  - Water system (ID 40040) connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 40038) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Powered by electric poles at (9.5, 17.5) and (9.5, 21.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is harvested before attempting to fuel multiple machines
- Keep copper ore in inventory before attempting to insert into furnaces

### Machine Connection Errors
- Steam engine shows "NOT_CONNECTED" status periodically - ensure pipe connections remain intact between power system components
- Regularly check and maintain pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine

### Production Flow Issues
- Automation science pack assembly machine shows ingredient shortages - ensure steady supply of copper plates and iron gear wheels to input chest
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters and mining drills to maintain continuous operation

### Machine Status Monitoring
- Check boiler fuel status regularly as it frequently runs out of fuel
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to prevent idle machines
